titles: Contemplations moral and divine by a person of great learning and judgment.
author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.
publisher: Printed by William  Godbid, for William Shrowsbury ... and John Leigh ...,
notes: Attributed to Matthew Hale. Cf. BM.
This title seems to be incomplete, with only 37 p. of a possible 2nd vol. on film.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
